job.title: Systems Engineer
job.description: pstrongJob descriptionstrongppThe Systems Engineer will be responsible for the oversight and administration of Keycentrixs IT assets both hardware and software This position will provide solution architecture development and deployment for Keycentrix internal users The position requires strong troubleshooting and diagnostic skills the ability to research design and implement new solutions from the ground up as well as strong communication and leadership skillsppstrongEssential Job Responsibilitiesstrongpp Develops IT solutions for Keycentrixs internal customers Provides IT architecture solutions to meet our critical business needspp Administers the installation and operation of all Keycentrix LANWAN related network services and security and control measurespp Troubleshoots and resolves LANWAN performance connectivity and related network problemspp Performs installations upgrades and support of computer hardware and software for internal customerspp Oversees IT projects ensuring smooth and successful executionpp Collaborates with internal customers and vendors on all projects timelines and budgetspp Advises and supports all company policies and procedures pertaining to IT administrationpp Communicates effectively with all internal customers ensuring customer satisfaction and strong business relationshipspp Oversees the documentation of all Keycentrix systems and procedures within the scope of IT architecture installation support and operationspp Performs any assigned tasks associated with support of external Keycentrix customers as directedpp Trains and may provide work direction to IT TechniciansppstrongQualificationsstrongpp Solid technical skills and experience with a variety of network protocols software and hardware involved in LAN and WAN operationspp Strong troubleshooting analytic and diagnostic skillspp IT architecture skillspp Strong project planning skillspp Ability to perform highlevel root cause analysis of technical issuespp Ability to communicate effectively with technical and nontechnical userspp Selfstarter but able to work with and leadmentor otherspp Availability to perform oncall work when necessarypp Excellent communication skillspp Project management experiencepp Disaster recovery and planning experiencepp Minimum 3 years of experience in at least 7 of the following areaspp TCPIP networkingpp WAN LAN WLANpp Standard network protocols HTTPS FTP SMTP SSL BGP EIGRP etcpp VLANspp VMware virtual server and workstation environmentspp Active Directory environments 2012 and abovepp Microsoft Operating Systems Server and Desktoppp VPN and remote access methodologiespp Server and desktop hardware installation configuration and support skillspp SonicWall firewall and network security experiencepp Backup and DR solutions specifically VeeamppstrongOther Preferred Skillsstrongpp CCNA or CCNP certificationpp MCSE MCSA certificationpp Network designarchitecture experiencepp VOIP telephony solutionspp Microsoft Cloud solutions SharePoint Office 365pp SAN NAS storage solution experience specifically with Nimble EqualLogic NetApp EMCpp Experience with network monitoring and performance tuningpp Linux Ubuntu Red Hat CentOSpp SQL databases SQL Server PostgreSQL Oraclepp Docker Kubernetes or other container solutionsppstrongEducation or Certificationsstrongpp Bachelors degree in Computer Science desired or commensurate degree and experience combinationppstrongAbout KeycentrixstrongppKeycentrix is a software and technology company based in Wichita Kansas For over 40 years we have provided powerful and affordable software that helps Independent Retail and Mailorder Pharmacies thrive We also provide bestinclass software solutions for Specialty Pharmacies with Newleaf software allowing pharmacies to run better smarter and faster while maintaining hightouch care for the communities and patients served Learn more about our full range of software and IT services at keycentrixcomppWe are proud to announce that we recently won the prestigious 2019 Surescripts White Coat Award for eprescriptions accuracy httpswwwpharmacytimescomnewskeycentrixwinssurescripts2019whitecoatawardforprescriptionaccuracyppKeycentrix is a member of the Cochener Garvey Capital Partners Inc family of businesses wwwcgcpicomppKeycentrix is committed to providing equal opportunity in employment for all people without regard to the following race color religion age gender sexual orientation marital status gender identity national origin physical or mental disability service in the military or any other attribute or characteristic protected by lawp
